# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="d2de5-102">清空收件匣</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d2de5-103">**我的 Outlook.com 收件匣是空的**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-103">**My Outlook.com inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d2de5-104">Firefox 瀏覽器中的某些增益集可能會妨礙您的收件匣載入。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d2de5-105">若要瞭解如何 [停用或移除附加](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons)元件，請造訪 Firefox 支援人員。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [disable or remove Add-ons](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d2de5-106">**我想要清空收件匣**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d2de5-107">若要清空收件匣並刪除所有的電子郵件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d2de5-108">選取圓形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d2de5-109">在郵寄清單頂端的 [ [收件](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) 匣] 旁邊，選取所有的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d2de5-110">在頁面頂端，如果焦點收件匣開啟) ，請選取 [**空白資料夾** (] 或 [**空白的焦點**  /  **空白**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d2de5-111">選取 [ **全部刪除**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d2de5-112">若要清除所有已刪除的郵件，請開啟 [[刪除的郵件] 資料夾](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems)並選取 [ **Empty folder**  >  **全部刪除**]，然後選取 [**復原已從此資料夾刪除的專案**] 頁面頂端，然後選取 [**清空資料夾**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d2de5-113">如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d2de5-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
